#summary Release notes for official releases of the CQEngine library


===Version 1.0.0 - 2012-10-29===
 * Added support for attributes returning null values via `SimpleNullableAttribute`, `MultiValueNullableAttrinute` (issue 2)
 * Bugfix to `ResultSet.uniqueResult()` (issue 4)
 * API same as in 0.9.1, no code changes necessary
 * Deployed to Maven central
